item.title: How to Use Promise.All() in Javascript
item.description: The File System (fs) module in NodeJS can come quite handy, but did you know that the fs module can return Promises? This can make things much more logical when it comes to understanding asynchronous programming with reference to the local file system. Here’s The Problem As part of my project to create a real-time inventory dashboard at work, I needed to seed a SQL database hosted on Azure with data from a bunch of text files.
